message: The SOURCE_TYPE field for indicator 3-9-1, translated into en
data:
Exposure: Indicator 7.1.2 was used as exposure indicator for household air pollution.

Annual mean concentration of particulate matter of less than 2.5 um was used as exposure indicator for ambient air pollution. The data is modelled according to methods described for Indicator 11.6.2.

Exposure-risk function: The integrated exposure-response functions (IER) developed for the GBD 2010 and 2013 (Burnett et al, 2014 and Forouzanfar et al, 2015) were used. These IERs were updated using the most recent epidemiological evidence identified through a systematic search of studies on particulate matter and mortality for the five outcomes of interest.

Health data: The total number of deaths by disease, country, sex and age group have been developed by the World Health Organization (WHO 2019b).
